name: Tatara Kogasa's Surprise Operation
description:
Tatara Kogasa's Surprise Operation on Halloween!

It's a grand operation to surprise everyone with cute Tatara Kogasa!?

Let's surprise Gensokyo's humans and youkais from behind and collect a lot of candy!

  • Controls
    • Arrow keys: Move
    • F: Hide
    • Shift: Run
    • SPACE: Trick AND Treat!
  • Supported Languages : English
  • v1.0 JAM Edition is made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 9 in 3 days.
  • Playtime: 3 min / round

===

타타라 코가사의 얄롱 깜짝 대작전!

귀여운 타타라 코가사가 모두를 놀래키는 대작전입니다!?

환상향의 인요들을 뒤에서 놀래켜 사탕을 잔뜩 모아보자고요!

  • 조작 키
    • 방향키: 이동
    • F: 숨기
    • Shift: 몰래, 몰래..
    • SPACE: 사탕 그리고 골탕!
  • 플레이타임: 한 판에 3분

===

CREDITS

  • Original work : 東方プロジェクト by ZUN
  • Code: Lever
  • Art: Snail-K
  • Music: Caramel64 (Youtube)
